name: 4G LTE™ Router with Voice
highlights:
Fast and reliable 4G LTE mobile internet for your home or office
Connect up to 40 Wi-Fi enabled devices simultaneously
Simple, affordable phone service over the U.S. Cellular wireless network
Wired Ethernet port which allows you to connect an additional wired device
Plug in any corded or cordless touch-tone telephone into the base unit, and you are ready to start making calls
Includes calling features like voicemail, call waiting, caller ID, call forwarding, E911 and three-way calling
categoryIcons:
Access the 4G LTE network* to send and receive pictures, download music, watch videos and browse the Internet at speeds up to 10 times faster than 3G.
*4G LTE network available only in select cities. See coverage map

Data Plan Required
deviceFinancingTargeter: If you have financed your device, the financed installment amount is not displayed, and will increase the Total Due Monthly amount on your actual bill.
